sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SearchSourceTableBlacklist</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Utility class to get table blacklist for search sources. </description>
        <name>SearchSourceTableBlacklist</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SearchSourceTableBlacklist = Class.create();
SearchSourceTableBlacklist.prototype = {
	type: 'SearchSourceTableBlacklist',
	_getProperty: function() {
		return String(GlideProperties.get('glide.search.search_source_table_blacklist', '')).trim();
	},
	get: function () {
		var blacklist = this._getProperty();
		var blacklist_array = [];
		if (blacklist) {
			 blacklist_array = blacklist.split(',');
		}
		return blacklist_array.map(function(term){
			return term.trim();
		});
	}
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-03-13 16:07:55</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5c4cc5ca23701300f4b4c50947bf658b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SearchSourceTableBlacklist</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Text Search API" source="com.glide.search">e0f2858f6d6620100acb70b353433023</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>protected</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5c4cc5ca23701300f4b4c50947bf658b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-03-13 16:13:49</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>487</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
